title: First aid: fire, accident and home safety
creator_credit: Tim Abbott, Sally Collier, Tony Shaddock and Dept of Health, Richmond Implementation Unit
brief_description: Designed to introduce the intellectual disability residential care worker to basic household precautions to avoid accident and fire, basic accident first aid techniques for use before the arrival of professional help, the different types of fire and how to deal with them and basic emergency procedures for evacuation and movement of residents in case of fire. Accompanied by 52p. in-service training manual.
